message.raw:
Separated filtergraph generation for trim + atrim, scale + pad, pan + volume
filters into three separate functions: silenceFilterGraph, resizeFilterGraph, &
panGainAudioGraph. This allowed making the stereo panning & gain both optional.
These are all called by generateFilterGraph, but can be used in isolation.
